test.description: reset user1 home and share user2 addressbook read-write
Sharee shared address book is read-write
Group for shared address book is read-only
vCard in shared address book is read-write
Cannot change group address book
add vCard
New vCard is member of addressbook group
Clean up
reset user1 home and share user2 addressbook read-only
shared address book is read-only
Group for shared address book is read-only
vCard in shared address book is read-only
vCard in shared address book cannot be deleted
vCard in shared address book cannot be modified
reset user1 home and share user2 group read-write
Sharee shared address book is read-write
vCard for shared group is read-write
vCard in shared group is read-write
vCard in shared group can be deleted
vCard with new UID shared read-write group can be added
New vCard is member of shared group
restore group membership
reset user1 home and share user2 group 345 read-only
Sharee shared address book is read-write
vCard for shared read-only group is read-only
vCard in shared read-only group is read-only
vCard in shared read-only group cannot be deleted
vCard in shared read-only group cannot be modified
reset user1 home and share user2 group g123 read-write, group 345 read-only
Sharee shared address book is read-write
vCard for shared read-write group is read-write
vCard for shared read-only group is read-only
vCard in read-write group is read-write
vCard in read-only and read-write group is read-write
vCard in shared read-only group is read-only
add vCard
New vCard is member of shared read-write group
New vCard is not member of read-only group
Clean up

test-suite.name: overlapping read-only, read-write shared groups, read-write addressbook

test.description: share user2 addressbook read-write
vCard in read-only group is read-write
add vCard
New vCard is NOT member of shared read-write group
New vCard is not member of read-only group
New vCard is member of addressbook group
Clean up

test-suite.name: overlapping read-only, read-write shared groups, read-only addressbook

test.description: share user2 addressbook read-only
shared address book is read-only
vCard in shared read-only group is read-only

test-suite.name: add to ab with two read-write shared groups

test.description: unshare address book, share 345 read-write
vCard with new UID shared read-write group can be added
New vCard is member of shared group
New vCard is member of shared group
